txt.en: 'I never thought to see such strength from one like her!'
Talk to Sabert within the entrance of Stangard
'No time to marvel at it... more foes approach!'
'What is that?'
Talk to Bingo and learn what tasks he will handle
'You were right! The Easterlings must have begun their attack!'
Talk to Langh치r and learn what tasks she will handle
Defend Sabert during the Easterling attack on Stangard
Sabert is at the entrance of Stangard, ready to prepare for the Easterling attack.
'Then we are safe. We have repelled the attack!'
'All of you have my thanks!'
Bingo is just inside the entrance to the outpost of Stangard.
'That Beorning woman really is something, isn't she? Did you see the way she fought? Such strength and ferocity! I must admit that she put even my own skills to shame!'
'What was that noise? Did you hear that?'
'I cannot stop thinking about that Beorning woman! She cut a most impressive swath through the Easterling invaders, did she not? Such strength and ferocity!'
'We may not have much time before the Easterling raiding party attacks Stangard. We must make the most of the time we have available if we are to be prepared!'
'I hear the sound of fighting!'
DNT - Blah!
'I will search for foes elsewhere in the town!'
You and Bingo have uncovered an Easterling plan to attack the outpost of Stangard.

'Finally, a task for which I am well-suited, [placeholder]! I will take care of the dirty dishes, and you can handle some of the tasks that require heavy lifting!\n\n'I will find you when I have finished!'
DNT - Blah!
Sabert has been stunned into silence by the appearance of Landroval, but you need him ready for battle: the Easterlings have begun their attack on Stangard!
'I am not doing any of those things, [placeholder].'
'[placeholder]! This town is under attack!'
'I have subdued these warriors, but more approach! Prepare yourself!'
'I circled this town from above, and saw no more foes nearby.'
Defend Sabert during the Easterling attack on Stangard

'What a creature, [placeholder]! I have never seen anything that might hope to compare! To think that such a majestic creature could come to the aid of my people... it defies expectation!\n\n'And this woman, this Beorning. She too fights for Rohan? We will stand together, [placeholder], and cast back our foes! From this point forward, we stand as friends and allies!'
Listen to Sabert describe the preparations you will need to complete
Bingo has returned from his errands, and is ready to participate in the battle... which is now concluded!

'What's that? The battle has already happened? I thought I heard something over the splashing of the suds, but I told myself it was simply my imagination!\n\n'At least the dishes are clean. Still, it would have been exciting to see Landroval and Langh치r in action! I do not mean to discount your own contribution, [placeholder]... I know you are quite impressive in battle yourself!'
'If the battle has already happened, I suppose we accomplished what we set out to do, [placeholder]!'
Convince Langh치r to help with some of the tasks
'The Men of Rohan are familiar with making preparations for war.'
'There are barrels of weapons atop the hill. We will carry them down here.'
'Then we will gather up fallen weapons wherever they may be.'
'Some of the men here have let their combat skills suffer. They could use some training.'
'We will need buckets of water brought to the watch-towers, in case the Easterlings wield fire.'
There has been a loud commotion to the south-west. Is the Easterling attack underway?
'We can carry those from up the hill.'
'Finally, we will need to clean up dirty dishes left from the noon-time meal.'
Langh치r is just inside the entrance to Stangard.
'Let us see if there are more Easterlings in Stangard, [placeholder]!'
'This way!'
'More Easterlings approach! Stand against them!'
Sabert has been defeated!
'Dishes beware! I will clean you up in no time!'
'You are most welcome, Sabert! All the dishes are perfectly clean!'
'Oh! Hello, Landroval! When did you arrive?'
Investigate the commotion to the south-west
Talk to Sabert in Stangard
Talk to Bingo in Stangard
Instance: Enter the Easterlings
